title: [Large-Scale] Formative Feedback Education Based on Video Podcasts for Pharmaceutical Calculations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical calculations and mathematical concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Provision of pharmaceutical calculation practice and feedback in simulation/VR environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain accurate problem-solving processes for pharmaceutical calculations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can compare video podcasts and text feedback to select feedback types aligned with learning objectives.
Based on feedback provided in VR simulation environments, learners can correct computational errors by over 70%.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
